tool_description: Ambiverse Natural Language Understanding API extracts entities from unstructured text, enabling a more precise transformation of texts into actionable, measurable, and easily accessible knowledge. Entities are identified by types such as person, location, organization, or product, and linked to the Wikipedia-derived YAGO knowledge graph. You can query the knowledge graph to obtain further information about these entities, such as Wikipedia links, textual descriptions, images, and lists of relevant categories.
name: Natural Language Understanding
title: Natural Language Understanding

api_list.name: /knowledgraph/entities/{id}
/entitylinking/analyze/_meta
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ambiverse-natural-language-understanding-v2.p.rapidapi.com/entitylinking/analyze/_meta"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ambiverse-natural-language-understanding-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /knowledgegraph/entities/searchByCoordinates
api_list.description: Searches for entities (identified by their knowledge graph IDs) at a specified point of interest within a given distance.

required_parameters.name: distance
required_parameters.description: The distance (in kilometers) to the point of interest in which to search for entities.

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: The longitude of a point of interest.

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: The latitude of a point of interest.
